content: व्यधिकरणं Subsisting in different receptacles or substrata; (as in व्यधिकरणबहुव्रीहि which means ‘a Bahuvrīhi compound, the first member of which is not in apposition, or stands in a different caserelation, to the second, in the dissolution of the compound; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} चक्रपाणिः, चंद्रमौलिः &c.)
